original: Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Dukadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (6)🔽18.13. Hetuhetusampayuttaduka, Hetuduka🔽Hetuñceva hetusampayuttañca hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu ceva nahetuvippayutto ca nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.🔽Hetusampayuttañceva na ca hetuṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetuvippayutto ceva nana
analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya  hetu hetu sampayutta duka hetu duka  hetum ca iva hetu sampayuttañca hetum dhammam paṭicca na hetu ca iva na hetu vippayuttaḥ ca na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka  hetu sampayuttam ca iva na ca hetum na hetum dhammam paṭicca na hetu vippayuttaḥ ca iva na na
translated: In the Direction of the Faculties, etc.🔽The Dual Set of Conditions in the Direction of Root, etc.🔽With respect to the root condition, there is root and there is a condition by way of root condition. With respect to the condition, there is a condition and there is a condition by way of root condition. With respect to the root condition, there is root condition and there is a condition by way of root condition. With respect to the condition, there is a condition and there is a condition by way of root condition.

original: ca hetu nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: ca hetu na na hetu dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā ekaṃ pe avigate eka saṅkhitta
translated: With respect to the condition, there is a condition and there is a condition by way of root condition. With respect to the root condition, there is root condition and there is a condition by way of root condition. With respect to the condition, there is a condition and there is a condition by way of root condition. With respect to the root condition, there is root condition and there is a condition by way of root condition.
